ai-ja199:1.2_0: and no damage in both places.
ai-ja199:1.3_0: This Koṭṭhita has laid down on asking,
ai-ja199:2.2_0: in a forest life with hope,
ai-ja199:2.3_0: Two months, having prepared a chariot,
ai-ja199:2.5_0: accusing to accuse him of an offense,
ai-ja199:3.1_0: You’re reborn in a ninth thing.
